Set of messages 1.Message: Hi! Did you know that research shows if you control your anger or do something positive, you increase your child's brain development? Be proud of yourself when you manage to do it!

Based on age group.Message for baby: If you are getting angry because your baby won’t stop crying, it’s OK to leave them on their back in a safe location, like a crib, and walk away for a bit. Check on your baby every 5-10 minutes.

Set of messages 2.Message: We hope that was helpful! Remember you can always type "Help" at anytime if you need an activity to help you relax or reduce stress. Chat to you later!
